data.label: Migrate
data.description: Migrates the Linode to a new host while it remains fully operational. Recommended for maximizing availability.

data.label: Power Off/Power On
data.description: Powers off the Linode at the start of the maintenance event and reboots it once the maintenance finishes. Recommended for maximizing performance.

data.label: Critical Workload - Avoid Migration
data.description: Custom policy designed to power off and perform maintenance during user-defined windows only.
